Skeletal

A clean foundation for a lovely frontend.

  1. Home
  2. Getting started
  3. Colors
  4. Typography
  5. Grid

Skeletal is a framework that provides a collection of default styles and Sass-mixins that help getting up and running on webdesign projects a lot quicker than writing everything from scratch does.

  1. Instant power-up

    You can use Skeletalâ€™s default styles as-is: drop the files in your project, add one line to your stylesheet and you are good to go.

    Skip your initial setup and improve your site with a cleaner look in seconds.

  2. Viewer-friendly

    Built-in responsiveness, clean typography and organization of content make your site simple and user-friendly.

  3. Tried and tested

    Skeletal grew out of real-world projects — its contents are robust and can be used to create a wide range of layouts.

  4. Neatly organized

    Keep your markup clean: all presentational attributes are kept in stylesheets for easy maintenance.

    Additionally, Skeletal does not clutter your setup. Everything is contained within a single directory that can easily be managed.

  5. Adaptable

    Change the defaults and select which features you want to include to make the system meet your requirements.

  6. More to come

    As it sees more real-world use, more improvements and refinements will be introduced to Skeletal.
